Description

Details

This is a must have product for music lovers on the move. Once you've used it, you'll wonder how you ever lived iDance BLUE300 offers a rich bass and full sound. BLUE300 is like no other. Never before has Bluetooth technology been combined in such a dynamic and innovative manner. For those on the move, BLUE300 offers complete flexibility - wherever you are and whatever you are doing. Listen to music from your mobile phone, PC or media player in headphone or speaker mode. All the traditional features of a Bluetooth headset are present, plus the inbuilt microphone offers speakerphone capability.

PYLE-PRO PHE400 Hum/Noise Eliminator 2-Channel Box with TRS Phone and XLR Inputs/Outputs

Breaks Ground Loops Safely - Maintains Highest Sonic Quality - 60 Hz Noise Removal - Removes AC Hum Noise.1/4-Inch TRS Phone & XLR Inputs/Outputs on 2-Channels - High-Performance Ultra-Compact Design - Passive Device: No Power Required.Audiophile High-Quality Components and Exceptionally Rugged Construction.Automatically Converts Unbalanced to Balanced Signal Without Any Signal Loss.Uses 11:1 Isolation Transformers to Break Loop Antenna and Balance Audio Lines
SKU: PYLPHE400

  • Description
  • Additional Info

Description

Details

Almost all 60Hz AC hum is caused by ground loops that act like radio antennae (loop antenna). The Hum Eliminator completely eliminates this by breaking the ground loop, making it impossible for the signal lines to pick up the AC hum and noise in the first place. Unbalanced lines are more susceptible to picking up electrical noise and RF interference than balanced lines - the longer the unbalanced cable, the greater the chance of a problem. Using this device to connect two pieces of equipment is one of the most cost-effective ways to convert between unbalanced signals and true balanced signals. Automatically Translates Signal Voltages to Match Difference in Ground Potentials.

Description

Details

The big daddy of Pie Irons, this fun and versatile cooking device makes two tasty sandwiches or pie at a time! Made from solid cast iron with dependable chrome plated steel handles, you won't find a better design on the market. To use simply place two pieces of buttered bread in the clam shell style compartment and stuff with preserves, cheese & meat, pie filling or whatever you want. Close the lid and toast over the fire until done. Also great for pastys, calzone and empanadas...the options are endless. Perfect for campfire or backyard firepits. Recipes included.

  • Solid cast iron cooking surface
  • Chrome-plated steel handles
  • Cooking surface: 8.5" x 4.25"
  • Overall length: 28"

Description

Details

The PBKCM3W is a new edition to the Pyle Sports line of equipment for your bicycle. This wired cycle computer contains a speedometer, odometer, trip timer, and clock. Ever taken a long bike ride, only to wonder how far you went or how long you were riding for? The PBKCM3W solves that problem: it’s perfect for bikers looking for more data from their bike trips. You’ll be able to calculate your average and maximum speed, plus save the length of your trip. It’s all on an easy-to-read LCD display with large digits. Plus, it shuts off automatically when not in use. Metric (meters) and SI (miles) units are both supported. Connects to your bicycle with a wired connection.

Description

Details

The cool cup for kids who have outgrown sippy cups but haven't outgrown spilling! 100-percent spill- and leak-proof kids cup uses AUTOSEAL technology to prevent accidental spills. Just press the button to sip and release the button to automatically seal. No lids to remove, no spouts to open. These cups are 100% BPA free, phthalate- and PVC-free and made with polypropylene (PP) #5. For use of kids 3-12 years of age. The cups have no loose parts and are perfect for kids on-the-go, in the car, or in school lunches. Easy-grip shape makes this kids cup easy to hold for smaller hands. Top-rack dishwasher-safe. Product measures 3-inch across widest part of lid x 7.25-inch height x 2.7-inch diameter at base Contigo Trekker At a Glance 100-Percent BPA Free Patented AUTOSEAL lid is 100-Percent leak and spill proof. Lid is also one piece, meaning no loose parts Easy grip shape makes this kids cup easy to hold for smaller hands 14-Ounce capacity Top rack dishwasher safe Caring for Your Contigo The Contigo Kids Trekker cup is top rack dishwasher safe. Always store with lid removed to prevent moisture from becoming trapped in the body or lid after washing. Do not keep liquids that spoil easily, such as dairy, in the bottle for prolonged periods. For use with cold beverages only. About Contigo Knowing that on-the-go beverages can be messy and complicated to use, Contigo developed a line of simple, yet functionally innovative drinkware to help people face life's daily challenges. The products are stylish, yet resilient; sleek yet strong--the perfect combination of performance and grace. Contigo products give you the confidence you need to face the day and pride in knowing that you bought the best of the best. Contigo is passionate about the products they create and believes you will be pleasantly surprised by the array of helpful innovations it offers.

Contigo AUTOSEAL Water Bottle, 24-Ounce

24-ounce water bottle in blue with patented 100-percent leak- and spill-proof Autoseal lid. Made of durable, BPA-free Tritan plastic--wont stain or retain odors. Carabiner clip on the handle makes the bottle easy to carry. Fits most car cup holders; wide opening for ice cubes. Dishwasher safe on the top rack

Description

Details

Stay hydrated throughout the day with this stylish 24-ounce Contigo water bottle which features convenient, 100-percent leak-proof AUTOSEAL technology. Made from durable, BPA-free Tritan plastic, this water bottle's body offers high impact resistance and won't stain or retain odors. This version comes in blue, and it's available in an assortment of colors. 100-percent spill- and leak-proof, plus a carabiner for transport.   The 100 percent spill- and lean-proof AUTOSEAL lid automatically seals between sips--there's no lid to remove or spout to open, making it impossible to spill. And it's great for one-handed, on-the-go drinking--perfect for gym workouts, hiking, walking, and busy days. Simply press the button to drink and then release to seal between sips. And because the lid system is always closed unless activated, your beverages will remain cooler for longer periods of time. By using this Contigo product, you're both helping the environment and also saving money by taking your water or juices on the road in a reusable container instead of buying water bottles on the go. A carabiner clip on the handle is great for attaching to a bag strap for hands-free portability. Volume markings help you gauge water intake. The water bottle fits most car cup holders and it has a wide opening to accommodate ice cubes. It measures 4-1/8 inches across the widest point of the lid, 10-3/8 inches tall, and 2-7/8 inches in diameter at the base. Caring for Your Contigo The 24-ounce Contigo water bottle is top rack dishwasher safe. Always store with lid removed to prevent moisture from becoming trapped in the body or lid after washing. Do not keep liquids that spoil easily, such as dairy, in the bottle for prolonged periods. For use with cold beverages only. About Contigo Knowing that on-the-go beverages can be messy and complicated to use, Contigo developed a line of simple, yet functionally innovative drinkware to help people face life's daily challenges. The products are stylish, yet resilient; sleek yet strong--the perfect combination of performance and grace. Contigo products give you the confidence you need to face the day and pride in knowing that you bought the best of the best. Contigo is passionate about the products they create and believes you will be pleasantly surprised by the array of helpful innovations it offers.

  • Description

Description

Details

If your clothes have started to smell not so fresh, it could be that your washer just isn't clean. Over time, dirt, grime and oils build up and don't come off in the washing cycles. Some of this odor cauing bacteria stays in the fabrics of your clothing! Affresh washer cleaner removes and prevents odor-causing residue that can occur in all brands of washers. While bleach only kills odor-causing bacteria leaving behind the detergent residue, Affresh Washer Cleaner uses surfactant chemistry to remove the root problem. Affresh cleaner is a formulated, slow-dissolve, foaming tablet that gets under residue, breaks it up, and washes it away leaving the washer smelling fresh and clean. Simply place one tablet in the wash basket (without clothes) and run a normal cycle (hot option) or clean washer cycle. Affresh brand is environmentally friendly, safe on septic tanks, and safe for all washer components. Package includes three tablets.

Description

Details

The Philips norelco 6945 electric razor provides you with the quality, closeness, and classic electric shave convenience that you've come to expect from Philips norelco. The close cut shaving system provides a close and efficient shave while its flexing head automatically adjusts to every contour of your face to provide a smoother shave with less irritation. With the ability to be used either cordless or with a cord and a voltage that automatically adjusts from 100 volts to 240 volts AC, the 6945 can be used anywhere. An 8-hour full charge will last for up to 10 days of cordless shaving and its quick charge system can power the razor for a shave after only 3 minutes of charging.
